评论详情: Absolutely love this and bought more. So comfortable for lounging, daily wear and even to sleep. Soft, stretchy, fits super well, material is well made, love the colors and fabric. This are my new go to outfits and be accessorized to look sporty, or style how you please for a sexy day or working from home or just sleeping and lounging. 评论详情: Purchased this set to wear for a relaxing Thanksgiving with family! I’m 5’1, 145-150 lbs & usually wear a medium. I knew it wasn’t going to fit like the model, but I was not expecting the shirt to be so long (I do have a shorter torso, on top of already being short) & baggy! I have 2 kids so I’m the proud owner of a mom pooch, and the pants sit just fine on it. Overall the set is cute, comfy and reasonably priced. Will probably order another color, just in a small!

I am in love with this set, I am a bigger gal and I was worried about the sizing but it is true to sizing. The fabric is not as stretchy as I thought it was going to be but it is more substantial and feels more like actual clothing than just PJ's or a lounge set. I feels more like an outside outfit but a really comfy outside set. I would feel completely comfortable to fly or travel in this set without feeling like I was wearing PJ's

If you’re looking for a lounge set, that is soft, warm, and comfortable, this is not it. The material is on a thinner side and the fabric is slightly scratchy and uncomfortable. I like the way the top fit. It’s nice and loose, but the pants did fit weird. They have a really long crotch. I had the roll of the waistband a couple times to make it fit better. I am a curvy 5’3” and 150 pounds. I’m usually a medium, but I sized up and ordered a large because I was looking for a looser fit.
Exactly what I was expecting. Soft. Cotton. Tailored fit. Great quality. Not see through. Super comfortable. Love this!

The look and quality are great!  The outfit looks like it's well made and has held up after a few washes.  The waist is a bit snug for a medium, so if you are a little thick in the waist I would order up a size.

Shirt was not as baggy as I wanted but overall love the outfit.
Fits on the big size. I should have sent it back and downsized. A lot of compliments!

I'll keep it for in the house lounge wear but will not step out the house with this fit... If you are looking for a very relaxed fit (like falling off your body) buy your normal size.
